staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. Bernie Sanders quote!): Now, Republicans not only have made Mr. Ryan chairman of the House Budget Committee, but on Tuesday the House is expected to vote to give him unprecedented powers to force spending cuts for the current fiscal year. That authority will allow Mr. Ryan to act unilaterally in setting an overall spending level for the rest of the year, a job usually handled by his full panel...." Up until this point, the Republican leadership has been vague about what federal programs they want to cut, said Sen. Bernie Sanders , a Vermont independent who caucuses with Democrats." On the other hand, Congressman Ryan has been very clear on this subject." " If the picture still isn't clear enough,

Howard Stern calls for Hollywood to boycott Jay Leno ( video) Howard Stern ended his third and final segment on Thursday night's Late Show once again pushing for David Letterman to holler back at him off camera: " Maybe we'll get our relationship on track. I want to say this. I offered my apology and it's sincere. If you trust that I'm somewhat normal now, what we'll do is we'll start by calling each other and then maybe I'll come out to Montana and I'll stare at the wall with you and we'll see what happens.
